title: Basic Bitch Quickie (BBQ) Weekly Roundup - February 28th
itunes:title: Basic Bitch Quickie (BBQ) Weekly Roundup - February 28th
description:
For our listeners new and old, we’ve changed up our basic bitch quickie model. This segment is still where we do a lightning round of top headlines from the week and give a quick top of mind thoughts about it. BUT we’re shifting it a little bit to be it’s own show piece on our weekly schedule! Other than talking about Madz need for a new coffee machine and Aleena's recycling craze, see below for the topics of the week:


  • Rosie O’Donnell and Priyanka Chopra Jonas drama
  • Ben Stiller ﻿and Christine Taylor are back together after splitting up 5 years ago
  • The Queen’s death hoax
  • Kanye’s New Muse Alert + all updates on the continuing Pete Davidson, Kayne West and Kim Kardashian saga
  • Amanda Bynes Files to End Conservatorship



Don't forget to follow us, review our podcast and subscribe on our socials!

  • Twitter: @BasicandBrain
  • Instagram: @TheBasicandTheBrain
  • TikTok: @thebasic_and_thebrain
  • Website: thebasicandthebrain.com

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
